name: 王泰典
objective: 介紹土壤的工程性質與常用的描述方式，使學習者熟悉土壤力學的基本原理，並具備相關課題基本的分析能力與計算技能。
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02: Origin of soil and grain size
W03: Weight-volume relationships, plasticity, and structure of soil
W04: Engineering Classification of soil
W05~06: Permeability and seepage
W06~07: Stresses in a soil mass
W08: Soil compaction, Midterm I
W09~10: Compressibility of soil
W10~11: Shear Strength of soil
W12~13: Lateral earth pressuer, Mid term II
W14~15: Soil-bearing capacity for shollow foundations
W16~17: Slope stability
W18: Subsoil exploration, Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance 15%
Evaluating items: presence and response
Homework 35%
Evaluating items: correctness and submitting timing
Midterms 30% (15% for each)
Final examination 20%
materials: Das, B. M. (2001), Principles of Geotechnical Engineering, 5th edition
